amendment.description: To clarify the responsibilities of the Secretary of Defense pertaining to the National Intelligence Program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3751 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3751 proposed by Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S10221-10222; text: CR S10221) To clarify the responsibilities of the Secretary of Defense pertaining to the National Intelligence Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3751 proposed by Senator Roberts.
